This fully accessible building includes a ranger-staffed information desk, brochures and Jr. Ranger program.", "parkCode": "fous", "addresses": [{"postalCode": "58801", "city": "Williston", "stateCode": "ND", "line1": "", "type": "Physical", "line3": "", "line2": ""}], "id": "2415", "latitude": ""}, {"contacts": {"phoneNumbers": [], "emailAddresses": []}, "longitude": "", "directionsInfo": "", "directionsUrl": "", "url": "http://www.nps.gov/fous/planyourvisit/hours.htm", "name": "Trade House", "latLong": "", "description": "Located immediately inside the fort's main, or south, gate, this accurately reconstructed Trade house is staffed by a park ranger dressed as a fur traders from the 1850s.
